lead_paragraph: A report in the Mets notebook in some editions on Saturday about the strong play of catcher Omir Santos misstated, in some copies, the given name of the Florida Marlins pitcher who yielded a home run to Santos on Friday. He is Sean West, not Mark.
snippet: A report in the Mets notebook in some editions on Saturday about the strong play of catcher Omir Santos misstated, in some copies, the given name of the Florida Marlins pitcher who yielded a home run to Santos on Friday. He is Sean West, not Mark.
